# MdList.Add Method

**Declaring Type:** [MdList](../index.md)

Adds the specified item to the list

```csharp
public void Add(MdListItem item);
```

## Parameters

`item`  [MdListItem](../../MdListItem/index.md)

## Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown when `item` is `null`.
